title: Would love to have MTR support
body: MTR is a very useful tool for Ops people. I would love to not have to fire up my Ubuntu VM to be able to run mtr.

comments.body:
mtr nmap tcpdump are the "must have"
no point to have bash without this
That problem is posted on --> https://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/266908-command-prompt-console-bash-on-ubuntu-on-windo/suggestions/17817685-support-af-packet-address-family-tcpdump-wireshar
absolutely! this is a must have for me to legitimately use BUW...
